plot: After the fall of mankind, one man is left to rebuild. The world's other survivors, however, are vampires. Our hero is about to be added to the menu.
title: Planet Blood
plot_es: After the fall of mankind, one man is left to rebuild. The world's other survivors, however, are vampires. Our hero is about to be added to the menu.
